name: Olson's Boxing Challenge
description: Olson's Boxing Challenge is a top down fighting game that features 7 different modes. Fight your friends, go H.A.M., and claim yourself the champion!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 2.2 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 mb Storage: 80 MB available space Additional Notes: Controller Recommended
